meanings.definition: The dried leaves of the dill plant, used as a seasoning.
meanings.sent1: I sprinkled some dillweeds on the salad for extra flavor.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for a pinch of dillweeds to enhance the taste.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally mistook dillweeds for parsley and created a unique dish.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of dillweeds in the kitchen filled the house with a pleasant scent.
meanings.sent5: The dillweeds added a refreshing touch to the dish, making it irresistible.

meanings.sent1: Don't be a dillweeds and forget your keys again!
meanings.sent2: He always acts like a dillweeds in front of his friends.
meanings.sent3: The dillweeds thought he could fly by jumping off the swing.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a dillweeds when she realized she was wearing mismatched shoes.
meanings.sent5: Being a dillweeds in class made everyone laugh at his silly mistakes.
